<h1>Fossilizer requirements</h1>
 <p>Fossilizer is a simple web application, written in web2py.</p>

<h2>Requirements</h2>
    <ul>
        <li>Unix(-like) OS (Linux, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, OS X, Solaris, Minix, etc)</li>
        <li><a href="http://www.web2py.com">web2py</a> (any version)</li>
        <li>python (>2.4)</li>
        <li>sqlite3 (and the python module which comes by default with most Python installations > 2.5)</li>
        <li><a href="http://www.fossil-scm.org">fossil</a></li>
        <li>CGI-capable web server ( I recommend <a href="http://www.cherokee-project.com">cherokee</a> but Apache, nginx, and Lighttpd will work )</li>

    </ul>
